summary: The true story about a father struggling to make amends with his twin sons as they pursue their dreams of professional baseball.
cast: Ed Harris|Brad Dourif|Robert Forster|Evan Jones|Logan Miller|Noah Miller|Ishiah Benben|Brandon Hanson|Lee Meriwether|Jake Waitman|Zack Waitman|John Laughlin|Bob Harvey|James Carraway|Richard Conti|George Maguire|Clayt Bertlesman|David Fine|Rod Gnapp|Jason Holthe|Jai Flicker|Shane Richardson|Evan Engle|Steve Berringer|Edgar Soto|Keith Francis|P.J. Carey|Vicki Cook|Kris Butler|Larry Kitagawa|Iniobong Udosen
title: Touching Home
